ContentVisibilityAutoStateChangeEventSki.summary: The skipped read-only property of the interface returns true if the user agent skips the element's contents, or false otherwise.

remarks.para:
-The event
-CSS Containment
-The content-visibility property
-The contain property

ContentVisibilityAutoStateChangeEventSki.value: A boolean. Returns true if the user agent skips the element's contents, or false otherwise.
